title: Development Process for a Practical Research Education Framework Based on the 5E Instructional Model

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational research methodologies and academic writing experience
context.additional_context: Corporate in-service language training program integrated with job roles conducted in BYOD environments

learning_goals: Learners systematically apply the 5E instructional model (Engage-Explore-Explain-Elaborate-Evaluate) from research topic selection to final report completion
Learners autonomously diagnose and improve research competencies using digital resources and feedback systems provided in the LMS
Learners select job-relevant research topics and produce practical outcomes through systematic data collection-analysis-interpretation processes
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
